column4: Can somebody help me figure out why I only transfer files at 13 megabytes/second (average) to another computer in my house (which runs ubuntu as well), but my windows machine transfers at around 26 megabytes/second to the same computer?  I'm getting about half speeds going through the same switch.
I would trust the numbers a *nix machine gave me for transfer rates over windows anytime.
transfer the same file from both, and time them.
maco: try this in a terminal ;) :cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep -e "cpu" -e "model"
